Moving from the Matter of Birds to the Matter of Rooftops

A stop motion animation based off of a poem by the israeli poet and writer Yehonatan Geffen.
With David Klein.

The poem (English translation):

To jump is the last thing,
It’s true sometimes,
I must admit,
I feel like trying,
And you say to yourself:
One step to the sky,
Is only a step
And that might be the only
Option to achieve
Eternal liberty.
But on second thought:
It’s still too early.
You’re young to jump.
And what would you do if
You fall next to one
That you don’t know?
Wait a few years,
First let others jump,
Do the testing,
First let rabbits jump and
See how they react.
In the meantime only go up,
Enjoy the view.
(Wait with the end).

-Yehonatan Gefen
(Translated from Hebrew)

Music by Oskar Schuster – "Sneeuwland"
oskarschuster.com
